Package org.project.ClientPack

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliUserInterface, GuiUserInterface
public interface UserInterface
interface implemented by GUI and CLI

      Starts a new thread to listen for user input and perform corresponding actions.

    • processReceivedMessage

      void processReceivedMessage(String serverMessage)
      Processes the received message from the server.
      Parameters:
      serverMessage - the received message as a string

    • ShowPObj

      void ShowPObj(String playerName)
      Displays the personal goal card for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player

    • displayMessage

      Displays a message to the user.
      Parameters:
      invalidMessageType - the message to be displayed

    • ShowCObj

      void ShowCObj(String playerName)
      Displays the common goal for all players.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player

    • SendJoinMessage

      void SendJoinMessage(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends a join message to the server using the provided client connection (rmi/socket). The method prompts the user to enter a username and sends the join message with the username.
      Parameters:
      client - The client connection interface used to send the join message.

    • SendCreateGameMessage

      void SendCreateGameMessage(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends a create game message to the server using the provided client connection (rmi/socket). The method prompts the user to enter a username and the number of players for the game. It sends the create game message with the username and number of players. After sending the message, the nickname field is updated with the chosen username.
      Parameters:
      client - the client connection interface used to send the create game message.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the remote method invocation.

    • SendQuitMessage

      void SendQuitMessage(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends a quit message to the server using the provided client connection (rmi/socket). The method sends the quit message with the current nickname to indicate the player's intention to quit the game.
      Parameters:
      client - The client connection interface used to send the quit message.

    • SendPickMessage

      void SendPickMessage(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends a pick message to the server using the provided client connection (rmi/socket). The method sends the pick message with the current nickname, the number of tiles to pick, and the list of coordinates indicating the positions of the tiles to be picked.
      Parameters:
      client - The client connection interface used to send the pick message.

    • SendTopUpMessage

      void SendTopUpMessage(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends a top-up message to the server using the provided client connection (rmi/socket). The method sends the top-up message with the current nickname, the flag indicating if it's the first top-up, and the index of the tile to be topped up.
      Parameters:
      client - The client connection interface used to send the top-up message.

    • SendChat

      void SendChat(ConnectionInterface client)
      Sends chat messages to other players.
      Parameters:
      client - the connection interface used for sending messages

    • serverDown

      void serverDown()
      Handles the case when the server is unreachable. Displays an error message, waits for 10 seconds, and then exits the application.

    • printBoard

      void printBoard()

    • printTiles

      void printTiles(String playername)

    • printGrids

      void printGrids(String playername)
      Prints the grid of a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playername - the name of the player whose grid is to be printed

    • updateClientViewTiles

      void updateClientViewTiles(String playerName, String[] tiles)

    • updateGridsView

      void updateGridsView(String playerName, String[][] grid)

    • updateClientView

      void updateClientView(ClientView clientView)
      Updates the client view.
      Parameters:
      clientView - the new client view to be set

    • fillChatMap

      void fillChatMap()
